story.title: DELTA'S STORY
story.description_1: Founded in 2020, Delta officially launched its project and pioneered in the field of information technology.
story.description_2: With the trust of customers and expert teams, we continuously develop and deliver optimal solutions for our clients.

service1.title: Advertising Services
service1.description: Expand advertising market to optimize costs and increase customer reach effectiveness.

service2.title: Game Production
service2.description: Develop creative and professional games to deliver excellent gaming experiences.

service3.title: Digital Content
service3.description: Create high-quality and engaging digital content to enhance customer interaction.
